product_name: Trail Guide to the Los Padre National Forest - Northern Section Trail Map - 7th Edition
long_description: Pocket-sized guide to the northern section of the Los Padres National Forest including Ventana and Silver Peak Wilderness Areas. Please note this item no longer includes a map. Copyright 2004.
short_description: Pocket-sized guide to the northern section of the Los Padres National Forest including Ventana and Silver Peak Wilderness Areas.
